Rare Special Items.name: ★ Karambit | Doppler
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted with black and silver metallic paints using a marbleizing medium, then candy coated.
Rare Special Items.lore: Getting lost in its color can prove fatal

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Flip Knife | Tiger Tooth
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been anodized orange and hand-etched in a tiger stripe pattern.
Rare Special Items.lore: Like the tiger it is rare... like the tiger it is deadly...

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bayonet | Ultraviolet
Rare Special Items.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a black and purple color scheme.
Rare Special Items.lore: Elegant design paired with brutal intent

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Bayonet | Marble Fade
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been painted with black and silver metallic paints using a marbleizing medium, then candy coated in three colors.
Rare Special Items.lore: The blade is made of many colors, but soon it all looks red

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Gut Knife | Damascus Steel
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been forged from a billet made from two different types of carbon steel.
Rare Special Items.lore: Finally, a weapon strong enough to match your resolve

Rare Special Items.name: ★ M9 Bayonet | Damascus Steel
Rare Special Items.desc: It has been forged from a billet made from two different types of carbon steel.
Rare Special Items.lore: Finally, a weapon strong enough to match your resolve

Rare Special Items.name: ★ Gut Knife | Rust Coat
Rare Special Items.desc: It is still perfectly operational although the exterior surfaces have rusted.
Rare Special Items.lore: Some people don't need to hide how dirty their deeds are

Covert Skins.name: AWP | Man-o'-war
Covert Skins.desc: It has been given a base coat of blue metallic paint then hand-painted with metallic gold swirls and accents.
Covert Skins.lore: Turn some heads before you take them off

Covert Skins.name: Galil AR | Chatterbox
Covert Skins.desc: It has been hand-painted and distressed. The skull painted over the dust cover appears to chatter when the bolt reciprocates.
Covert Skins.lore: Some say that when you laugh, the world laughs with you...but when Chatterbox laughs there are only screams

Classified Skins.name: P250 | Muertos
Classified Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with circular motifs.
Classified Skins.lore: This one is steeped in tradition and blood

Classified Skins.name: AK-47 | Cartel
Classified Skins.desc: It has been engraved with skeletons, flowers and serpents.
Classified Skins.lore: One little squeeze turns every morning into the Day of the Dead

Classified Skins.name: M4A4 | 龍王 (Dragon King)
Classified Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with the image of a dragon in red and blue.
Classified Skins.lore: A weapon worthy of The Monkey King himself - Booth, Arms Dealer

Restricted Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Urban Shock
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with urban camo and blue accents.

Restricted Skins.name: MAC-10 | Malachite
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been painted using metallic effect paints and given a wavy pattern using a rubber comb tool.
Restricted Skins.lore: Bright colors hide a gun with a dark purpose

Restricted Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Serenity
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been hand painted with the image of a woman with wings.
Restricted Skins.lore: Serenity is a luxury few can afford - Valeria Jenner, Revolutionary

Restricted Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Naga
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been engraved with a mythological motif.
Restricted Skins.lore: A beast in Indian mythology as well as on the battlefield

Mil-Spec Skins.name: M249 | System Lock
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with a sci-fi design.

Mil-Spec Skins.name: SCAR-20 | Grotto
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been sponged and brush-painted with blue metallic effect paints.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: The founder of Season Corporation had this piece commissioned after being rescued by renowned Operator Kotaro Izaki

Mil-Spec Skins.name: XM1014 | Quicksilver
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted using a translucent hydrographic with a terrain map motif over metallic silver paint.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Sometimes you need an unstable element to solve your problems - Kotaro Izaki, Breach Expert

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Glock-18 | Catacombs
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted using a hydrographic of skulls over a silver metallic paint base.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Intimidation is the sincerest form of flattery

Mil-Spec Skins.name: MP9 | Deadly Poison
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been custom painted with dynamic, angular shapes and a stylized spider.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: It's not the first bite that kills you, it's the 29 that come after
